context: Use in context of: Лето в Италии ждет вас!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.

accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual for the email campaign, capturing the essence of summer in Italy with bright and sunny visuals of beaches, Italian cuisine, and cultural landmarks.".
